author: bfoster
msg: Added environment variable support for properties files

author: bfoster
msg: - dynamically determines which class threw the exception and logs it
- changed all exceptions to extend this exception

author: bfoster
msg: Modified ExternalSources.xml to handle regular expressions
- Config.java was modified to read in the new ExternalSources.xml
- Config.java is now able to handle multiple class specifications for a given
protocol type (if one fails, the next listed Protocol class will be use. . .etc).

author: bfoster
msg: - now can handle being pointed at a directory of dirstruct files
Modified dirstruct element in the dirstruct xml files
- added new attribute "root_based" (which tells Crawler whether it should start at the root
or whatever the directory is set to after log it -- so preset HOME directory)
- combined connect() and login() methods (now two libraries have required modification to use this
interface, so changed so modification does not need to be done.
- thus will now change back to non-forked build of jsch next chance i get
- getHomeDir() which returns the home directory
- cdToRoot() which changes to root directory

author: bfoster
msg: updated a few bugs in the libraries used by run-scripts.
-- added newline to end of file
